ability.Eclipse Guard: Increases Defense by 1 stage when hit by a Dark-type move.
ability.Thunder Roar: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the attacker when Zhuqian is hit by an attack.

Thunder Lash.effect: It will cause paralysis. If the target is already paralyzed, the power of this move has a 30% chance to increase by 50%.

Shadow Coils.effect: Traps the target for four turns. Damages the target with each turn equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP.

Steel Howl.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Coiling Guard.effect: Increases the user's Defense by 2 stages and heals 1/4 of its maximum HP.
